gamesList.name: DOTA 2
gamesList.description: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover.

gamesList.name: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
gamesList.description: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

gamesList.name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
gamesList.description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) expands upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered when it was launched 19 years ago.

gamesList.name: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS
gamesList.description: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS is the first in the award-winning series to recreate epic conflict across ancient China.

gamesList.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
gamesList.description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is the latest installment of the acclaimed first-person shooter franchise developed by the renowned Ubisoft Montreal studio.

gamesList.name: Grand Theft Auto V
gamesList.description: Los Santos is a city of bright lights, long nights and dirty secrets, and they don’t come brighter, longer or dirtier than in GTA Online: After Hours. The party starts now.

gamesList.name: Rust
gamesList.description: The only aim in Rust is to survive. To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals for meat.

gamesList.name: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
gamesList.description: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a wacky physics-based tactics game. Experience accurate warfare through the ages.

gamesList.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
gamesList.description: Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, Skyrim Special Edition brings the epic fantasy to life in stunning detail.

gamesList.name: Watch_Dogs 2
gamesList.description: Welcome to San Francisco. Play as Marcus, a brilliant young hacker, and join the most notorious hacker group, DedSec. Your objective: execute the biggest hack of history.

gamesList.name: Beat Saber
gamesList.description: Beat Saber is a VR rhythm game where you slash the beats of adrenaline-pumping music as they fly towards you, surrounded by a futuristic world.

gamesList.name: Terraria
gamesList.description: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. Four Pack also available!

gamesList.name: Dead By Daylight
gamesList.description: Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed.

gamesList.name: ARK: Survival Evolved
gamesList.description: Stranded on the shores of a mysterious island, you must learn to survive. Use your cunning to kill or tame the primeval creatures roaming the land, and encounter other players to survive, dominate... and escape!

gamesList.name: Garry's Mod
gamesList.description: Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

gamesList.name: Mortal Kombat 11
gamesList.description: Mortal Kombat is back and better than ever in the next evolution of the iconic franchise.

gamesList.name: Farming Simulator 19
gamesList.description: The best-selling franchise takes a giant leap forward with a complete overhaul of the graphics engine, offering the most striking and immersive visuals and effects, along with the deepest and most complete farming experience ever.

gamesList.name: DayZ
gamesList.description: The post-soviet country of Chernarus is struck by an unknown virus, turning the majority population into frenzied infected.

gamesList.name: RAGE 2
gamesList.description: RAGE 2 brings together two studio powerhouses – Avalanche Studios and id Software – to deliver a carnival of carnage where you can go anywhere, shoot anything, and explode everything.

gamesList.name: No Man's Sky
gamesList.description: No Man's Sky is a game about exploration and survival in an infinite procedurally generated universe.

gamesList.name: Subnautica: Below Zero
gamesList.description: Dive into a freezing underwater adventure on an alien planet. Set one year after the original Subnautica, Below Zero challenges you to survive a disaster at an alien research station on Planet 4546B.

gamesList.name: Left 4 Dead 2
gamesList.description: Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008.

gamesList.name: Portal 2
gamesList.description: The 'Perpetual Testing Initiative' has been expanded to allow you to design co-op puzzles for you and your friends!

gamesList.name: Just Cause 4
gamesList.description: Rogue agent Rico Rodriguez journeys to Solis, a huge South American world home of conflict, oppression and extreme weather conditions.
